node.text:
Greetings, traveler. I deal in cybernetic implants and credit wedges. I can convert your old cybernetic implants into hard currency at a fair rate.
Low tier implants: 1 credit wedge Mid tier implants: 2 credit wedges High tier implants: 3 credit wedges
What can I do for you?
node.choice: I have cybernetic implants to trade.
Let me see your regular wares.
